channel.title: [Req] Tut on how to add a Render to a BG
channel.description: I need a tut on how to put a render on a background. I need step by step if possible XD, i'm a n33b at photoshop. I HAVE looked for a long time though.

item.title: [Req] Tut on how to add a Render to a BG
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“carlos master slayer, post:4, topic:61570”][quote author=hey321 link=topic=88718.msg937354#msg937354 date=1172345837]
I need a tut on how to put a render on a background. I need step by step if possible XD, i’m a n33b at photoshop. I HAVE looked for a long time though.
[/quote]ok photoshop has a tool menu on the eraser saying background eraser
if your gonna use a render when you already have a background do that or when you don’t or are using multiple renders use background cutter or background eraser[/quote]
You, sir, are an imbecile in the greatest degree.

OLD THREAD IS OLD.
PLEASE LOCK FOR GREAT JUSTICE.

Read full topic
item.source: [Req] Tut on how to add a Render to a BG

if your gonna use a render when you already have a background do that or when you don’t or are using multiple renders use background cutter or background eraser

item.title: [Req] Tut on how to add a Render to a BG
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

if i remember all you need to do is make a new layer do what you want to do on the background then double click on the background click on delete it then you are done
